about_the_game:
In the indie horror game "The Exorcist" you immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a mysterious and creepy world, where you have to take on the role of a young exorcist. Having just finished your training, you go on your first assignment, and it turns out to be not as easy as you expected. It leads you to a church where there is already a coffin with an executed witch, over whose body the necessary rituals must be performed for several nights. Every step on the creaking floor causes an echo echoing in the empty halls. There is a feeling of fear and something otherworldly in the air. You feel that you are not alone in this gloomy place. Your main task is to expel the evil spirit inhabiting the body of the deceased witch.

Using the ancient rituals described in the sacred books, you must find a way to expel the spirit from the dead body before it gets stronger and finds a new living body. During the game you will have to study the sacred texts, which are full of riddles and complex rituals. You will face various challenges — from puzzles to frightening encounters with ghosts and manifestations of dark forces. Your actions will determine how well you will cope with this terrible task. It is important not only to know what rituals to perform, but also to be able to respond to unexpected threats that may appear at any moment.

Throughout the game, you will collect the necessary things and objects for the rituals that will help you in exorcising the spirit. Every decision you make will have consequences, and it depends on your choice whether you will be able to free the church from evil or remain forever in its shadow. Immerse yourself in the gloomy atmosphere of "Witch Exorcist", where your every action is worth its weight in gold, and fear and tension lurk around every corner. Will you be able to resist the dark forces and fulfill your destiny, or will you become another victim of the relentless witch?

Features of the game:

The most ordinary horror, but with normal graphics and competent gameplay. It's not innovative, large-scale, intriguing at all - it's an ordinary walking simulator with screamers. However, the challenges and gameplay will make you shit your pants.
